missing.networking

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • missing.networking.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    The Client is responsible for sending inputs from the player to the server and providing an instance of the game to the view package to be displayed to the player.
